name: WhizZdumb
overview: WhizZdumb Network is a sustainable open innovation and crowd-sourcing engine that enables its users to solve their key problems by leveraging knowledge capital and facilities available globally at various technical and business Institutions. Users’ can match and hone their social & professional skills against a global cadre of experts in different fields of art, science & management. Platform is built on the idea that social & business networks can be more intuitive, efficient, leveraging ingenuity while reducing costs and time needed to solve our most pressing social, economical & environmental problems by embracing faster and better innovation through collaboration.
